verse.gurmukhi: iek bwx hI so pur qIn hnY ]10]
verse.unicode: ਇਕ ਬਾਣ ਹੀ ਸੋ ਪੁਰ ਤੀਨ ਹਨੈ ॥੧੦॥

en.bdb: The poet now wants to describe that mighty warrior who could kill that three-eyed demon with one arrow.10.

ss.gurmukhi: ijs ny iek hI bwx nwl iqMno purIAW nSt kr id`qIAW sn ]10]
